title: Best of the Program | Guest: Sen. Mike Lee | 6/14/22
description:
Sen. Mike Lee discusses the latest SCOTUS opinions released, the opinions to come later this week, and the recent bipartisan gun control bill. Glenn reads a story from the Atlantic that highlights the dangers and horrors of fentanyl. Glenn dives deeper into the Google AI "LaMDA" that some reports claim has become sentient.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
